title: Real Brand Stories To Inspire You
subtitle: Catch us innovating with cutting-edge projects that redefine industry standards.

brands.name: Orby
brands.description: We developed Orby's AI-powered mobile and web platform, powered by the first Large Action Model, that streamlines enterprise tasks for enhanced efficiency through intelligent automation.
brands.imageText: What will you do with your time back?

brands.name: freshworks
brands.description: We built Freshworks' AI-powered mobile app and web platform that integrates Freshdesk Agnes support tickets with Salesforce for seamless IT services and faster resolutions.

brands.name: Khatabook
brands.description: We developed Khatabook's digital ledger mobile app and web platform, making it the fastest-growing SaaS company for seamless financial management and tracking.

brands.name: CARATLANE
brands.description: We created CaratLane's e-commerce mobile app and web platform, offering 5,000+ timeless jewelry designs, making elegance accessible and affordable for every occasion.
